ISSUE.TITLE: Unable to create SingleSelect with type anyenum
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Node: **v10.19.0** Arch: **x64** Platform: **linux** Docker: **false** Database: **pg** ProjectOnRootDB: **false** RootDB: **sqlite3** PackageVersion: **0.84.15** **Steps To Reproduce** 1. Go to Add new Column 2. Choose `SingleSelect` Column Type 3. Click on Show more 4. Choose `anyenum` Type in Database 5. Click Save **Expected behavior** Creating new SingleSelect Column with `anyenum` Type in Database. **Traceback** ``` Within DB_TABLE_UPDATE handler { api: 'tableUpdate', env: '_noco', dbAlias: 'db', project_id: 'lesser_marsupial_n2nq', args: { tn: 'self_employed_service', _tn: 'self_employed_service', originalColumns: [ [Object], [Object], [Object], [Object], [Object], [Object], [Object] ], columns: [ [Object], [Object], [Object], [Object], [Object], [Object], [Object], [Object] ] }, sqlOpPlus: true } { api: 'tableUpdate', env: '_noco', dbAlias: 'db', project_id: 'lesser_marsupial_n2nq', args: { tn: 'self_employed_service', _tn: 'self_employed_service', originalColumns: [ [Object], [Object], [Object], [Object], [Object], [Object], [Object] ], columns: [ [Object], [Object], [Object], [Object], [Object], [Object], [Object], [Object] ] }, sqlOpPlus: true } ╔═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╗ ║ ║ ║ EXCEPTION OCCURED!! in PGClient @ tableUpdate ║ ║ - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ║ ║ MESSAGE: ║ ║ ALTER TABLE "self_employed_service" ADD "asd" anyenum NULL ;;
